metadata.title: [EXPERIMENTAL] FedRAMP Defined Identifiers and Accepted Values [DRAFT]
metadata.author: FedRAMP PMO
metadata.description: This EXPERIMENTAL and DRAFT file provides the FedRAMP defined identifiers and acceptable values in a machine-readable format.

value-set.name: system-identifier-type
value-set.description: Indicates the source of the unique ID assigned to the system. FedRAMP requires a FedRAMP-assigned identifier; however, additional identifiers may also be provided.

value-set.name: address-type
value-set.description: The type of address for the party

value-set.name: eauth-level
value-set.description: The eAuthentication level as defined by NIST SP 800-63, Revision 3.

value-set.name: identity-assurance-level
value-set.description: The identity assurance level as defined by NIST SP 800-63, Revision 3.

value-set.name: authenticator-assurance-level
value-set.description: The authenticator assurance level as defined by NIST SP 800-63, Revision 3.

value-set.name: federation-assurance-level
value-set.description: The federation assurance level as defined by NIST SP 800-63, Revision 3.

value-set.name: authorization-type
value-set.description: The FedRAMP Authorization Type

value-set.name: service-model
value-set.description: The cloud service model.

value-set.name: deployment-model
value-set.description: The cloud deployment model.

value-set.name: security-level
value-set.description: The security objective level as defined by NIST SP 800-60.

value-set.name: privacy-designation
value-set.description: Indicates whether this system is privacy sensitive.

value-set.name: privacy-threshold-analysis-q1
value-set.description: Does the ISA collect, maintain, or share PII in any identifiable form?

value-set.name: privacy-threshold-analysis-q2
value-set.description: Does the ISA collect, maintain, share PII info from or about the public?

value-set.name: privacy-threshold-analysis-q3
value-set.description: Has a Privacy Impact Assessment ever been performed for the ISA?

value-set.name: privacy-threshold-analysis-q4
value-set.description: Is there a Privacy Act System of Records Notice (SORN) for this ISA system?
value-set.remarks: If "yes" a SORN ID must be provided.

value-set.name: security-sensitivity-level
value-set.description: The security sensitivity level for the system.

value-set.name: likelihood
value-set.description: The likelihood of a risk.

value-set.name: impact-level
value-set.description: The impact level of a risk.

value-set.name: information-type-system
value-set.description: Identifies the system from which the information type was defined.
value-set.remarks: FedRAMP only allows information types defined in NIST SP 800-60v2r1.

value-set.name: system-operational-status
value-set.description: The operational status of the system

value-set.name: component-operational-status
value-set.description: The operational status of the component

value-set.name: user-type
value-set.description: Identifies the user type.

value-set.name: user-privilege
value-set.description: Identifies the privilege level of the user.

value-set.name: user-sensitivity-level
value-set.description: Identifies the sensitivity level of the user.

value-set.name: interconnection-direction
value-set.description: Identifies the direction of information flow for the interconnection.

value-set.name: interconnection-security
value-set.description: Identifies the type of security applied to the interconnection.

value-set.name: component-type
value-set.description: identifies the component type.

value-set.name: asset-type
value-set.description: Identifies the type of asset.

value-set.name: scan-type
value-set.description: Identifies the type of scan.

value-set.name: transport-type
value-set.description: The internet protocol transport type.

value-set.name: virtual
value-set.description: Indicates if the asset is virtual.

value-set.name: public
value-set.description: Indicates if the asset is exposed to the public Internet.

value-set.name: allows-authenticated-scan
value-set.description: Indicates if the asset is capable of having an authenticated scan.
value-set.remarks: if the value is "no", the prop remarks must contain the reason why.

value-set.name: is-scanned
value-set.description: Indicates if the asset is scan.
value-set.remarks: if the value is "no", the prop remarks must contain the reason why.

value-set.name: control-implementation-status
value-set.description: The implementation status of the control.

value-set.name: control-origination
value-set.description: The point(s) from which the control satisfaction originates.

value-set.name: attachment-type
value-set.description: Identifies the type of attachment.
value-set.remarkas: Not all values apply to all FedRAMP artifacts.

value-set.name: hash-algorithm
value-set.description: Identifies the algorithm used to create the hash value of the attachment.

value-set.name: role-type
value-set.description: Identifies the type of role for a responsible party.

enum.label: CSP Assessment PoC
enum.#text: Cloud Service Provider Assessment Point(s) of Contact

enum.label: CSP End of Testing PoC
enum.#text: Cloud Service Provider End of Testing Point(s) of Contact

enum.label: CSP Results PoC
enum.#text: Cloud Service Provider Point(s) of Contact

value-set.name: media-type
value-set.description: A subset of IANA media types expected to be encountered.
